Package index

All functions

AddFeatures()
Add nodes or edges to a sfnetwork
AdjacencyMatrix()
Make an adjacency matrix from an sf object
AssembleReddData()
Combines survey tracks, counts, and a network into a data frame
AssignReaches()
Divide a network into reaches
AttachData()
Attach Data to a network
CheckNetwork()
Check a network and correct common problems
ConstructStreamVAST()
ConstructStreamVAST This function constructs objects with class "StreamVAST". Depending on the arguments supplied, it will either initialize the object from countdata and reachdata, or it will add details to an already defined StreamVAST object.
CropArea()
Crop an sf shape - A graphical wrapper for the st_crop function
Dharmaplot()
Plot the dHARMa scaled residuals, accounts for dummy data
EditFeatures()
Edit a shape or network in real time
ExtractBasin()
Extracts a basin or subbasin
FindRoots()
FindRoots
FixLoops()
Guides the user in how to fix loops
Jeremy_sample_variable()
Title
LocateFeature()
Locate a feature on a shape or network
LocateRoot()
Locate the root of a network
MakeEscapement()
Make a table of escapement values based on the AUC method
MakeReddSurvival()
Convert redd data into survival data set
Makesfnetwork()
Make a sf network
MakeSurveyTracks()
Makes sf LINESTRINGs representing survey transects
plotEscapement()
Make a plot of yearly escapement values
plotPredictionMap()
Maps, the desired data, with options for facetting
plotStream()
Makes a line plot that shows tributaries by stream distance
plotSurvivalCurves()
Plot survival curves from a INLA survival model
plotSurvivalHistogram()
Plot a histogram of survival estimates across years and reaches
PointSetup()
Point Setup and checking
PruneNetwork()
Prunes a network based on various criteria
RiverMeasureLL()
Converts river measures and Lon/Lat coordinates
RootNetwork()
Adds or changes the root of a network
SetTemporalFrame()
This function takes a streamvast object defines a temporal sampling frame and formats everything for use with vast
SimplifyNetwork()
Simplifies a sfnetwork
SurvivalTable()
Summarize the results of a survival model in tabular form
VASTpreds()
Get density predictions from a VAST model
